com.o3dr.android.client.apis

Class ControlApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.o3dr.android.client.apis.Api
      • com.o3dr.android.client.apis.ControlApi

  • public class ControlApi
extends Api
    Provides access to the vehicle control functionality.

    Use of this api might required the vehicle to be in a specific flight mode (i.e: GUIDED)

    Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 9/7/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ControlApi.ManualControlStateListener
      Used to monitor the state of manual control for the vehicle.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(float targetAngle,
                   float turnRate,
                   boolean isRelative,
                   AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Instructs the vehicle to turn to the specified target angle
        Parameters:
        targetAngle - Target angle in degrees [0-360], with 0 == north.
        turnRate - Turning rate normalized to the range [-1.0f, 1.0f]. Positive values for clockwise turns, and negative values for counter-clockwise turns.
        isRelative - True is the target angle is relative to the current vehicle attitude, false otherwise if it's absolute.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state.

      • manualControl

        public void manualControl(float vx,
                          float vy,
                          float vz,
                          AbstractCommandListener listener)
        Move the vehicle along the specified normalized velocity vector.
        Parameters:
        vx - x velocity normalized to the range [-1.0f, 1.0f]. Generally correspond to the pitch of the vehicle.
        vy - y velocity normalized to the range [-1.0f, 1.0f]. Generally correspond to the roll of the vehicle.
        vz - z velocity normalized to the range [-1.0f, 1.0f]. Generally correspond to the thrust of the vehicle.
        listener - Register a callback to receive update of the command execution state.
        Since:
        2.6.9

      • enableManualControl

        public void enableManualControl(boolean enable,
                                ControlApi.ManualControlStateListener listener)
        [Dis|En]able manual control on the vehicle. The result of the action will be conveyed through the passed listener.
        Parameters:
        enable - True to enable manual control, false to disable.
        listener - Register a callback to receive the result of the operation.
        Since:
        2.6.9
